content: **material** * cotton yarn for crochet hook size 1 75-2mm i used 2 rico design essentials crochet 50g 280m white 100% cotton * crochet hook 2mm * tapestry needle * scissors **stitches/vocab** * chain - chain * double_crochet - double_crochet * sl - slip_stitch * yo - yarn over **chart key** * space = chain 2 skip 2 stitches double_crochet in double_crochet * block = 3 double_crochet **increase** * at the end of a row yo pull up one loop this will be the base for the next stitch yo and continue double_crochet 3 double_crochet for the additional block * at the beginning of the row chain 6 double_crochet in 5th chain from hook 2 double_crochet **decrease** * sl across the first block 4 stitches chain 3 =first double_crochet 2 double_crochet **loops top two row ** * in the odd row two blocks = 6 double_crochet + the one double_crochet from the last space so there will be 7dc * in the even row one long space length of two connected spaces 8 chain 3ch= 1 double_crochet at the beginning of the row the top most part of the curtain + 5 for the free space 1 double_crochet
